Class com.icl.saxon.ItemRenderer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.icl.saxon.ElementHandlerBase
           |
           +----com.icl.saxon.ElementCopier
                   |
                   +----com.icl.saxon.ItemRenderer
public class ItemRenderer
extends ElementCopier
Class ItemHandler()

A general-purpose element handler that outputs the target element with a supplied prefix and suffix.

Typically used via the setItemRendition method of class Renderer.

ItemRenderer(String, String)
Constructor initialises default actions.
Note that attribute values can be substituted into either string, using the notation "«element/attribute»".

endElement(ElementInfo)
Output suffix string at end of element
startElement(ElementInfo)
Output prefix string at start of element

ItemRenderer 
 public ItemRenderer(String before,
                     String after)
Constructor initialises default actions.
Note that attribute values can be substituted into either string, using the notation "«element/attribute»". Two special attribute names are recognised: "*" meaning the character content of the element, and "#" meaning its element number (allocated only if element numbering is in use.)

Parameters:
before - String to be output before each instance of the element
after - String to be output after each instance of the element

startElement 
 public void startElement(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Output prefix string at start of element

Overrides:
startElement in class ElementCopier
endElement 
 public void endElement(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Output suffix string at end of element

Overrides:
endElement in class ElementCopier
